tns:patch.author: acartaleanu
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_project_age_ratio;
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_project_age_ratio AS SELECT vpa.amp_activity_id, (vpa.project_age :: Real) / (vpp.project_period :: Real) AS project_age_ratio FROM v_project_age vpa JOIN v_project_period vpp ON vpa.amp_activity_id = vpp.amp_activity_id;
